creator: zhihong@gmail.com
text:
OAuth is an authorization protocol supported by many web sites (AOL, Google, Yahoo, Twitter, NetFlix). The protocol is based on HTTP but HTTP Sampler can't be used because it requires signing. The signature needs to be appended to the request on the fly.

I extended HTTPSampler2 to support OAuth and would like to incorporate the sampler in JMeter distribution.

The sampler is very small (only 4 classes, about 1000 lines of code) and the only dependency is OAuth library, which is already under Apache license.

Please contact me (zhihong AT gmail) for code contributions.
Can you provide a link to the OAuth library please?
